name: Sonic Blast Ball
overview:
The Sonic Blast Ball Arcade Machine is a fast-paced ticket redemption game featuring one of the most famouse characters in video game history - Sonic the Hedgehog!

The gameplay concept is simple and straight forward, very easy for players of all ages to understand, but is also quite fast which presents the fun and challenge!

Players must activate the gates at the top, to drop the rotating ball into the play area. This game requires a great deal of hand-eye coordination and players will be aiming to drop the ball through Sonic’s bonus zone to get a spin on the bonus wheel and win up to 1000 tickets!

Sonic Blast Ball Arcade Machine's exciting gameplay and low play area means that Sonic’s latest redemption game is fun for all the family! Also, it's small footprint allows this machine to fit into a wide variety of locations, including play areas, street locations, restaurants and family entertainment centers.
